member.name: T:VslangProj100.VBProjPropId100
member.summary: Enumerates properties specific to Visual Basic.

member.name: T:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100
member.summary: Represents project properties for all Visual Studio projects.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_TargetFrameworkMoniker
member.summary: The target framework moniker used by the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisRuleSet
member.summary: The path to the file containing the rule set used by the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisRuleSetDirectories
member.summary: List of directories to search for rule sets used by the project.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisIgnoreBuiltInRuleSets
member.summary: Flag indicating whether to ignore built-in rule sets.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisRuleDirectories
member.summary: List of directories to search for rules specified in the rule set file.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisIgnoreBuiltInRules
member.summary: Flag indicating whether to ignore built-in rules.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjPropId100.VBPROJPROPID_CodeAnalysisFailOnMissingRules
member.summary: Flag indicating whether code analysis will fail if any rules are missing.

member.name: T:VslangProj100.VsProjReferencePropId100
member.summary: Enumerates the reference properties of a project.

member.name: F:VslangProj100.VsProjReferencePropId100.DISPID_Reference_EmbedInteropTypes
member.summary: Indicates whether interop types are embedded in the target assembly.
